name: Vitamin
overview: An action game created by Rainer Böhme and published in 64'er Sonderheft 90. Friday the 13th: a historic date. Researchers from all parts of the galaxy have finally succeeded in developing the antiserum »Vitamin« against entire colonies of computer malware that the virus mafia has smuggled into the vital systems of countless planets. Destroy the headquarters of the virus bosses with the new miracle weapon!
